conversations.description: User reports a car accident, provides policy number and upload photos of vehicle damage.
User files a water damage claim for their kitchen, submits photos of the burst pipe and repair estimate.
User asks to retrieve their homeowner policy details before filing a claim for roof damage.
User uploads a photo of a broken smartphone and wants to claim under personal electronics coverage.
User inquires about the likelihood of approval for a collision claim after a rear‑end crash.
User wants to check the status of an already submitted claim using the claim reference ID.
User asks to view all past claims on their auto policy to see patterns in claim frequency.
User provides a police report image for a theft incident and requests claim preparation.
User wants to estimate repair costs for a dented bumper using an uploaded image and a mechanic’s quote.
User inquires whether their travel insurance covers a canceled flight due to a pandemic.
User uploads a veterinary bill for a pet’s surgery and asks to file a claim under pet health coverage.
User requests a prediction of approval odds for a flood damage claim on their basement.
User asks to edit incident details after realizing they entered the wrong date for a car crash.
User wants to know deductible amounts for different claim types in their comprehensive auto policy.
User supplies a photo of a shattered windshield and asks for a claim to be submitted immediately.
User asks for a summary of their policy coverage limits before deciding to claim for a fire.
User provides a screenshot of a medical bill and wants to file a claim under health insurance.
User wants to compare the predicted approval risk for two separate claims: car accident vs. property damage.
User uploads images of a hail‑damaged roof and asks to populate the claim form with damage estimates.
User asks to retrieve claim history to verify if a similar claim was previously denied.
User reports a rental car incident abroad and wants ClaimMate to handle the international claim process.
User asks whether a recent flood qualifies under their policy and requests an automatic eligibility check.
User provides a photo of a broken window and asks the assistant to estimate replacement cost.
User wants to know the expected timeline for claim settlement after submission.
User uploads a damaged laptop image and asks to claim under their personal property coverage.
User asks to fetch policy documents to verify if flood damage is covered before filing.
User requests a claim status update after receiving a notification that the adjuster is reviewing the case.
User wants to submit a claim for a stolen bicycle, providing police report and photos of the bike.
User asks to calculate the total out‑of‑pocket cost after applying deductible and policy limits.
User provides an image of a cracked bathtub and wants to file a homeowners insurance claim.
User asks to predict approval risk for a claim involving multiple damaged items after a storm.
User wants ClaimMate to automatically pre‑fill a claim form using OCR on a scanned damage report.
User inquires about the exact coverage for rental car replacement after their car is declared a total loss.
User asks to pull claim history and identify the most common cause of past claims for their policy.
User uploads a photo of a damaged fence and asks to estimate repair costs and submit a claim.
User wants to know if their policy includes coverage for emergency lodging after a house fire.
User asks to retrieve the policy number from a previous email to avoid re‑entering it.
User provides an image of a damaged kitchen countertop and requests claim assistance with contractor estimate.
User asks to get a prediction of claim approval for a high‑value jewelry loss.
User wants ClaimMate to monitor claim status and notify them when the adjuster makes a decision.
User uploads a photo of a dented side mirror and wants instant claim form population.
User asks whether their policy covers damage caused by a recent earthquake.
User wants to see a breakdown of how the predicted approval probability was calculated.
User provides a scanned bill for home repairs and asks to extract line items via OCR for claim entry.
User wants to cancel a claim that was mistakenly submitted and start a new one with corrected info.
User asks to compare two policy options based on predicted claim approval rates for water damage.
User supplies a photo of a damaged roof shingle and asks for guidance on filing a roof insurance claim.
User wants a summary of all active claims and their current statuses across multiple policies.
User asks if a recent car theft is covered under their comprehensive coverage and wants to file a claim.
User uploads a photo of a broken oven and asks for claim assistance, including estimated repair cost.
User wants to know the next steps after a claim is approved, including payout methods.
User asks to retrieve policy clauses related to flood exclusions before filing a claim.
User provides a photo of a smashed phone screen and wants the claim form pre‑filled with device details.
User asks to predict claim approval for a multi‑vehicle accident where two cars were involved.
User wants ClaimMate to automatically submit the claim after the user confirms the populated form.
